result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Wozniak was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael J Wozniak is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael J Wozniak was found guilty of Cause Child 13-18 to View Sex. Activity, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.055(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Use a Computer to Facilitate a Child Sex Crime

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Bond applied to court costs.

Pay all fees and costs.
Follow all rules of the Department.
Counseling as deemed appropriate including COMPAS assessment and follow through.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample by CALLING the Winnebago County Jail, Work Release Unit, WITHIN 72 HOURS, to set up an appointment during the hours of 8:00 a.m. - 4:00. p.m. Monday through Friday, at 920-232-1915 or 920-232-1919.  Defendant shall provide proof of identification along with the court minutes stating a DNA sample is required.  Failure to comply with this order may result in either a finding of contempt of court or a criminal charge of Failure to Provide a DNA Sample pursuant to Wis. Stats., 946.52.
Maintain employment.  Perform 20 hours of community service if not working.
(AMENDED 07/31/17):  Use of the Internet is left at the discretion of the Department of Corrections and the probation agent.
COMPLY WITH SEX OFFENDER REGISTRY LAW.

timeConds.notes:
4 MONTHS IMPOSED.  2 MONTHS STAYED.  Granted Huber, if in compliance with jail regulations.  NO good time.  Report to Winnebago County Work Release Center within 72 hours to establish a report date.  Def. to begin serving jail sentence within 60 days.  Credit for 7 days.
CORRECTED:  TRANSFER AUTHORIZED TO OUTAGAMIE COUNTY.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence.
